analytic.title: Copying Greek into Slavonic? The Slavonic Branch of the Greek Tradition of the Life of Abraham of Qidun

monogr.title: Editing Mediaeval Texts from a Different Angle: Slavonic and Multilingual Traditions, Together with Francis J. Thomson’s Bibliography and Checklist of Slavonic Translations

body.bibl: Stern, Dieter. “Copying Greek into Slavonic? The Slavonic Branch of the Greek Tradition of the Life of Abraham of Qidun.” In Editing Mediaeval Texts from a Different Angle: Slavonic and Multilingual Traditions, Together with Francis J. Thomson’s Bibliography and Checklist of Slavonic Translations, edited by Lara Sels, Jürgen Fuchsbauer, Vittorio Tomelleri, and Ilse De Vos, 225–50. Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta 276. Leuven: Peeters, 2018.

Dieter Stern, Copying Greek into Slavonic? The Slavonic Branch of the Greek Tradition of the Life of Abraham of Qidun,” in Editing Mediaeval Texts from a Different Angle: Slavonic and Multilingual Traditions, Together with Francis J. Thomson’s Bibliography and Checklist of Slavonic Translations, ed. Lara Sels et al., Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta 276 (Leuven: Peeters, 2018), 225–50.
